members.member: TODO LIST: - Incorporate attributes - Account for rounded corners in recteangles - Account for numeric values having units (yeah, have seen it happen...) - Account for transforms: translate, scale, matrix - Account for Groups (and their transforms) - Improve "path" importing to account for different types of geometry

member.name: M:SVGImport.SVG.ImportFile(System.String)
member.summary: Given a list of filepaths for SVG files, generate path geometry based on its contents. If a "Z-Height" property is found, the layer will be translated to this height.

member.name: M:SVGImport.SVG.RemoveConsecutiveDuplicatePoints(Autodesk.DesignScript.Geometry.Point[])
member.summary: Goes over a list of Points, and removes points that are consecutively duplicate O(n)
